mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIP (DEPARTURE, DESTINATION, CREATED_TIME, DEPARTURE_TIME, TRIP_TYPE,TRIP_STATUS, PASSENGER_ID) VALUES(#{departure}, #{destination}, #{createdTime}, #{departureTime}, #{tripType} , #{tripStatus}, #{passenger.id})
mapper.select: SELECT T.ID TRIP_ID, DEPARTURE, DESTINATION, CREATED_TIME, DEPARTURE_TIME, TRIP_TYPE,TRIP_STATUS, P.ID PASSENGER_ID, D.ID DRIVER_ID FROM TRIP T LEFT OUTER JOIN PASSENGER P ON T.PASSENGER_ID=P.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DRIVER D ON T.DRIVER_ID=D.ID WHERE T.ID=#{id}
